Trade/Device Name(s): Tyson Bio HS100 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Tyson Bio HS100-B Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Tyson Bio HS100 Blood Glucose Meter
Tyson Bio HS100-B Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Tyson Bio HS100 and HS100-B Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems using electrochemical biosensor technology for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertips, forearm, or palm; for self-testing by people with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor diabetes control effectiveness, not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
